revised_title: The Structure and Development of the Stem in Pteridophyta and Gymnosperms
tldr: The author examines the structure and development of the stem in pteridophyta and gymnosperms, focusing on the fibro-vascular system and its role in plant growth and classification. They study the complex arrangement of fibro-vascular strands and the process of stelar development in various plant species, providing insights into the understanding of vascular plants' morphology and taxonomy.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Biology
